nodes.text: Daniel José Older (born January 18, 1980) is the author of "Born in the Storm," a short story which appears in the anthology From a Certain Point of View, celebrating the 40th anniversary of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, about Sardis Ramsin, a stormtrooper riding a dewback. Older has loved dewbacks from a young age and expressed his love for the species on multiple occasions.
Older also wrote the Solo: A Star Wars Story tie-in novel Last Shot, which was released on April 17, 2018. Older also narrated part of the novel's audiobook.
He is currently working on Star Wars: The High Republic with Cavan Scott, Claudia Gray, Charles Soule, and Justina Ireland.
